text: Hopea pierrei is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is an endangered2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species Downloaded on 21 August 2007. tree found in Cambodia, where it is still relatively abundant in the Cardamom Mountains,World Wildlife Fund - Cardamom Mountains Moist Forests but rare in Indonesia, Laos, Malaysia, Thailand, and Vietnam. ==References== pierrei Category:Endangered plants Category:Trees of Indo-China Category:Trees of Sumatra Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea pierrei
